title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #77: Deathloop First Impressions
description: We offer up our initial impressions of Deathloop and discuss The Artful Escape, Murder Mystery Machine and Lost in Random plus we also answer junk mail questions about DLSS and remakes vs remasters.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #76: Playstation Showcase 2021
description: We discuss all of the big announcements from Sonyâ€™s Playstation Showcase 2021 including Spider-Man 2, Wolverine and Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic Remake plus we also talk F.I.S.T., Proteus, Dicey Dungeons, Myst and Superliminal.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #75: 2021 Fall Game Preview + Psychonauts 2
description: We run down all of the big upcoming games for the fall / holiday season and rate our excitement level for each plus we also talk Psychonauts 2 and Recompile.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #74: Gamescom 2021 + Twelve Minutes
description: We count down our top 5 announcements from Gamescom 2021 (so far) and talk Dodgeball Academia, Toodee and Topdee, Axiom Verge 2 and Hades, plus we also dive into a deeper group discussion on Twelve Minutes.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #73: Rocket Rumble + ID@Xbox / Nintendo Indie World Showcases
description: Alex from PixelNAUTS joins us to talk about their new game Rocket Rumble and to help us breakdown the ID@Xbox Twitch Showcase and Nintendo Indie World Showcase plus we also talk Axiom Verge 2, Roki, Cyberpunk 2077 and Final Fantasy II Pixel Remaster.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #72: Junk Mail - Desert Island Games, Favourite Soundtracks and More
description: We dip into the Game Junk mailbag to answer some of your questions about indie game profitability, speedrunning, desert island games and favourite game soundtracks plus we also discuss Final Fantasy Pixel Remaster, Skyward Sword HD, the Fracked demo and more.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #71: Annapurna Interactive Showcase
description: We get excited about the various indie game announcements and updates presented during the first ever Annapurna Interactive Showcase plus we also talk The Ascent, Paradise Killer, The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD, Death's Door, Half-Life: Alyx and more.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #70: EA Play Live 2021 + Skyward Sword HD First Impressions
description: We discuss all of the announcements from EA Play Live 2021 including the Dead Space remake plus we also talk The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD, Death's Door, Horizon Zero Dawn and The Pedestrian.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #69: Steam Deck Announcement
description: We offer our initial opinions on Valve's Steam Deck handheld PC gaming console and speculate on what Netflix getting into video games might look like plus we also talk Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion, Mario Golf: Super Rush, CrossCode, Phantasy Star and Sam & Max: This Time It's Virtual!.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #68: Deathloop State of Play + Switch OLED Announcement
description: We run through all of the news from Sony's latest State of Play including the Deathloop extended gameplay trailer and react to the Nintendo Switch OLED announcement plus we also talk Mario Golf: Super Rush, Scarlet Nexus, Dark Alliance, CrossCode, Nier: Automata, Skyrim VR and Chicory: A Colorful Tale.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #67: Abandoned / Hideo Kojima Rumours + Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
description: We fall down the rabbit hole of Abandoned / Silent Hill conspiracy theories and discuss the controversy over God of War: Ragnarok coming to PS4 plus we also talk Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart, Backbone, the NORCO demo, Maneater, Puzzle Bobble VR and Final Fantasy VII Remake Integrade Intermission.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #66: E3 2021 Recap and Reactions
description: We run through all of the announcements from E3 2021 in an epic length show with a focus on the Microsoft and Nintendo press events plus we also discuss some of the interesting indie games revealed and try to answer that age old question, "Who won E3?".

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #65: Summer Game Fest 2021 Kickoff
description: We breakdown all of the announcements from the Summer Game Fest Kickoff livestream and the Day of the Devs event plus we also talk Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade, the Scarlet Nexus demo, Backbone and Biomutant.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #64: Most Wanted E3 2021 Announcements
description: We count down the top 5 E3 announcements we'd most like to see this month and discuss some of the rumours and predictions already out there plus we also talk Mass Effect Legendary Edition, Biomutant, Battlefield 1, Operation Tango and PHOGS!.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #63: Horizon Forbidden West Gameplay Reveal + Biomutant
description: We react to the Sony State of Play gameplay video for Horizon Forbidden West plus we also discuss the latest Unreal Engine 5 tech demo and talk Biomutant, Resident Evil: Biohazard and Resident Evil Village.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #62: Top 5 Horror Games
description: We count down our top 5 horror games of all time and discuss The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword amiibo controversy plus we also talk Mass Effect Legendary Edition, Final Fantasy IX, Resident Evil: Village and 999.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #61: Resident Evil Village + Junk Mail
description: We offer our thoughts on Resident Evil Village and discuss Manifold Garden and The Mosaic plus we also answer some questions from Discord covering topics like difficulty levels, DualSense design ideas, PC gaming and video game malaise.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #60: Returnal First Impressions
description: Jay from Film Junk joins us to discuss Returnal, the roguelike genre and whether it matters if you beat a game plus we also talk Kaze and the Wild Masks, Control and Resident Evil 7: Biohazard.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #59: Ratchet & Clank State of Play + Paying Full Price for Games
description: We get into the debate over whether gamers should support their favourite games by paying full price for them and discuss Sony's latest State of Play with a Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart gameplay demo plus we also talk Genesis Noir, Kaze and the Wild Masks and Nier: Automata.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #58: D.I.C.E. Awards 2021 + Oculus Gaming Showcase
description: We break down all of the winners from the 24th Annual D.I.C.E. Awards and discuss some of the announcements from the Oculus Gaming Showcase plus we also talk MLB The Show 21, Fantasian, Little Nightmares, Nier: Automata and Xcloud beta on iOS and PC.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #57: Resident Evil Showcase + Nintendo Indie World Showcase
description: We try to figure out if The Last of Us remake story is actually news plus we discuss all of the announcements from the latest Resident Evil and Nintendo Indie World showcases and talk NieR: Automata, Hollow Knight, Clap Hanz Golf, Mini Motorways and A Monster's Expedition.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #56: MLB The Show Coming to Game Pass + Outriders
description: We discuss the ramifications of MLB The Show arriving on Xbox Game Pass on Day 1 and talk about EA's dynamic game difficulty patent plus Frank tells us why Hideo Kojima is overrated and we also get into Outriders, Kaze and the Wild Masks, NBA 2K21, Oddworld: Soulstorm, Wargroove and Prime 2D.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #55: Playstation Store Shutdown
description: We discuss the impending shutdown of the PS3, PSP and Playstation Vita digital stores as well as the future of digital game sales and backwards compatibility plus we also talk Narita Boy, It Takes Two, Resistance: Burning Skies, Disco Elysium, Tales of the Neon Sea.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #54: Nobody Saves the World Reveal + Xbox Indie Showcase
description: Graham Smith from Drinkbox Studios joins us to talk about their upcoming game Nobody Saves the World plus we also discuss the ID@Xbox Spring Showcase and Manifold Garden, Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order, Deep Rock Galactic, Ratchet & Clank and Undertale.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #53: Square Enix Presents Spring 2021
description: We discuss everything announced from the Square Enix Presents Spring 2021 video and Sony's new next-gen PSVR controller plus we also talk Undertale, The Talos Principle and the original Doom.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #52: Bethesda Joins Xbox
description: We discuss the Xbox / Bethesda roundtable livestream and the newly announced TMNT game plus we also talk Doom (2016), Fallout: New Vegas, Castlevania: Lords of Shadow and Little Nightmares.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #51: Top 5 Controllers + Microsoft Mesh
description: We count down our all-time favourite game controllers and discuss Nintendo Switch Pro rumours as well as the new Microsoft Mesh reveal plus we also talk Maquette and Ultimate Chicken Horse.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #50: Sony State of Play Feb. 2021
description: We offer thoughts on all of the games shown during Sony's latest State of Play broadcast and discuss the announcement of a new Playstation VR system plus we also talk 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim, Spelunky 2, Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War Season 2, and The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #49: Nintendo Direct February 2021
description: We walk through the various games announced during the latest Nintendo Direct (a few of which weren't ports or remakes) plus we also discuss the PS5 DualSense class action lawsuit and talk Bowser's Fury, The Suicide of Rachel Foster, Destruction All-Stars, A Hand with Many Fingers and Paper Beast.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #48: MetaHuman Creator + Nintendo Switch Concierge Service
description: We get wowed by Unreal's new photorealistic character creation tool MetaHuman Creator and discuss the benefits of Nintendo's recently announced Concierge Service plus we also talk World of Horror, Cyberpunk 2077, Immortals Fenyx Rising and Journey to the Savage Planet.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #47: Playstation Wrap-Up + The Medium
description: We compare stats from the 2020 Playstation Wrap-Up to see who is the ultimate gamer and discuss The Medium plus we also talk Control, Indivisible, Cyber Shadow, Immortals Fenyx Rising, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Hyperstone Heist and Cyberpunk 2077.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #46: Most Anticipated Games of 2021
description: We count down our most anticipated games of 2021 plus we also discuss Cyber Shadow, Indivisible, The Pedestrian and Cyberpunk 2077.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #45: Microsoft Messes Up + The Return of Lucasfilm Games
description: We discuss the Xbox Live Gold price increase and reversal, the Resident Evil Village demo and showcase as well as the announcement of new Star Wars and Indiana Jones games plus Gris, Indivisible, The Solitaire Conspiracy, Fuser, Down in Bermuda.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #44: Top 10 Games of 2020
description: We look back on the year in gaming and count down each of our top 10 games of 2020.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #43: Has Sony Been Neglecting Indie Games?
description: We answer a lot of your junk mail questions including a discussion about why Sony might be losing the indie market to Nintendo and Microsoft and games we'd like to see remastered plus we also talk Nioh 2, X-Men Destiny and Marvel's The Avengers.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #42: KFConsole Cluckbait
description: We debate whether the KFConsole is actually worth talking about, recommend some sports games for non-sports fans and discuss all the games we played over the holidays including Immortals Fenyx Rising, NHL 21, Children of Morta, Super Meat Boy Forever, Yes Your Grace, Murder By Numbers, Call of the Sea.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #41: Cyberpunk 2077 Launch Debacle
description: We discuss the Cyberpunk 2077 backlash and the repercussions of refunds being offered on various platforms plus we also continue to offer thoughts on the game itself and talk ScourgeBringer, The Falconeer and The Occupation.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #40: The Game Awards 2020 + Cyberpunk 2077 First Impressions
description: We count down our top 5 announcements from The Game Awards 2020 and discuss some of the winners plus we also give our initial impressions of Cyberpunk 2077.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #39: Next-Gen Availability Issues + Metal Gear Solid Movie Casting
description: We discuss next-gen console availability issues and the Metal Gear Solid movie casting news plus we also talk ScourgeBringer, Crash Bandicoot 4, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, NHL 94 Rewind, Dragon Quest XI and Pistol Whip.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode #38: The Game Awards Nominees + Xbox Series X First Impressions
description: We discuss the nominees for The Game Awards 2020 and debate Phil Spencer's comments about toxic fans, plus Frank buys an Xbox Series X and we talk Watchdogs: Legion, Call of Duty: Black Ops: Cold War, Maneater and Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 37: Capcom Hack + Project 007 Announcement
description: We discuss the Capcom hack, some of their leaked upcoming games and IO Interactive's upcoming Bond game announcement plus we talk Final Fantasy VIII, River City Girls and more Playstation 5 talk including Spider-Man: Miles Morales and Bugsnax.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 36: Playstation 5 First Impressions
description: The future of gaming has arrived! We express the excitement of our first experiences with the Sony Playstation 5 plus we also talk Spider-Man: Miles Morales, Astro's Playroom, Demon's Souls, The Pathless, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, Sackboy: A Big Adventure, Call of Duty: Black Ops: Cold War, Quantum Break and Star Wars Squadrons.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 35: Next-Gen Launch Preview
description: We run through the launch titles for the Xbox Series X and PS5 and discuss some of the early quirks and issues being reported for both systems plus we also talk Star Wars Squadrons, Resident Evil 7: Biohazard, Supraland, Full Throttle Remastered and Quantum Break.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 34: PS5 DualSense Unboxing
description: Frank unboxes the new Sony DualSense controller plus we also discuss the release of Control on the Nintendo Switch via the cloud and talk Half-Life: Alyx, Resident Evil 7: Biohazard, Creaks, Observer, Ikenfell and the Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity demo.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 33: PS5 User Experience First Look + Oculus Quest 2
description: We dig in to some of the new features of the PS5 user interface and discuss the Microsoft / GameStop digital sales deal plus Andrew gives first impressions of the Oculus Quest 2 and we talk Genshin Impact, Mario + Rabbids Kingdom Battle, The Collage Atlas and Katana Zero.

title: Game Junk Reviews: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Dax and Scott join Frank and Andrew for a full review of the PS4 game Ghost of Tsushima.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 32: PS5 Teardown + Polymega
description: We discuss a handful of smaller news stories including the PS5 Teardown video, the latest next-gen pre-order stats and the Polymega retro console plus we also talk Animal Crossing: New Horizons, Among Us, Pathway, Hypnospace Outlaw, Super Mario Galaxy and AI: The Somnium Files.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 31: Top 5 Consoles of All Time
description: We count down our top 5 consoles of all time and discuss Amazon's new Luna streaming service plus we also briefly touch on the new Console Wars documentary.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 30: Microsoft Buys ZeniMax
description: We break down the Microsoft acquisition of ZeniMax (which includes Bethesda and id) and discuss whether Frankie spoke too soon about the next-gen console war already being over, plus we evaluate the Xbox Series S and Series X preorder situation and we also talk Hades, Carrion, Spiritfarer and Breath of the Wild.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 29: Sony's PS5 Showcase and Price Reveal
description: We argue about Sony's PS5 prices and the pre-order "debacle" plus we also discuss the various PS5 games shown off at Sony's press event, the official Xcloud launch and Frank's attempt to force himself into a Switch phase.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 28: Xbox Series S Reveal
description: We discuss Microsoft's dual next-gen console strategy and pricing for the Xbox Series S and Series X plus we also recap the announcements from the latest Ubisoft Forward and talk Spiritfarer, Vader Immortal, The Last Campfire and Ghost of Tsushima.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 27: Super Mario Bros. 35th Anniversary Direct
description: We discuss the recent Super Mario Bros. announcements and debate Nintendo's fixation on limited edition exclusivity plus we also talk Vader Immortal, Ghost of Tsushima and Carrion and breakdown potential porting problems for the Nintendo Switch.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 26: Gamescom 2020
description: We discuss some of the announcements and trailers from the opening night of Gamescom 2020 and the rumoured PS5 launch date plus we also talk Spiritfarer, Carrion, Ring Fit Adventure, Days Gone and The Sinking City.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 25: Gotham Knights / Suicide Squad Reveal
description: We get hyped for Gotham Knights and Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League after DC FanDome and discuss how the Epic / Apple lawsuit is affecting the Unreal Engine plus we also talk Spiritfarer, Battletoads, Judgment, Final Fantasy VII, Rogue Legacy 2 and Microsoft Flight Simulator.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 24: #FreeFortnite
description: We discuss the Epic Games vs. Apple / Google Lawsuit and the Halo Infinite delay plus we also talk Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout, Xeno Crisis, The Touryst and Grounded.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 23: Sony State of Play August 2020
description: We recap all the games shown off during Sony's latest State of Play video and discuss Rocksteady's Suicide Squad game and Microsoft's Project Xcloud dispute with Apple, plus we also talk Shadow of the Colossus, Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout and various Xbox Summer Game Fest demos.

title: Game Junk Reviews: The Last of Us Part II
description: We scrounge up a full spoiler-filled review of The Last of Us Part II with special guest Scott.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 22: Xbox Games Showcase
description: We break down everything announced during the Xbox Games Showcase and critique the gameplay reveal for Halo Infinite plus we also talk Ghost of Tsushima and Paper Mario: The Origami King.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 21: Most Wanted Xbox Series X Announcements
description: We count down the top 5 things we'd like to see from next week's Xbox Games Showcase and discuss the Sony Dualsense Hands-On Demo, plus we also talk Journey to the Savage Planet, NHL 20 and Frank gives first impressions of Ghost of Tsushima.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 20: Ubisoft Forward 2020
description: We recap the announcements from Ubisoft Forward 2020 and discuss Sony investing in Epic Games plus we also talk Bloodborne and Unavowed and debate using walkthroughs and trophy guides.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 19: Next-Gen Game Prices
description: We examine the rumours of a $10 jump in next-gen game prices, Apple Arcade ending some game contracts and the popularity of roguelite games plus we also talk The Last of Us Part II, Wargroove and Little Orpheus.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 18: Are AAA Games Too Long?
description: We debate Shawn Layden's recent comments about the AAA model being unsustainable and discuss the new trailers for Marvel's Avengers plus we also talk The Last of Us: Part II.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 17: EA Play Live 2020
description: We discuss all of the announcements and non-announcements from EA Play Live plus we also talk Xbox Smart Delivery, the Upload VR Showcase, and Frank gives his first impressions of The Last of Us Part II.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 16: Sony's PS5 Future of Gaming Event
description: We run through everything that Sony unveiled at their Future of Gaming event including the actual look of the Playstation 5 and count down our top 5 games confirmed for the next-gen system.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 15: Most Wanted PS5 Games
description: We count down the top 5 announcements we'd like to see from the delayed Playstation 5 press event and answer some of your junk mail questions plus we also talk Final Fantasy VII Remake, Axiom Verge and Uncharted: Drake's Fortune.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 14: The Last of Us Part II State of Play + Iron Man VR Demo
description: We give our thoughts on The Last of Us Part II State of Play video and suit up for the Iron Man VR demo plus we also talk Deliver Us to the Moon, Infamous First Light and Minecraft Dungeons.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 13: Fortnite Party Royale
description: We discuss the Tenet trailer premiere in Fortnite and the game as a social platform plus we also talk Uncharted: Golden Abyss, The Last of Us, Golf with your Friends, Final Fantasy VII Remake and Full Throttle Remastered.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 12: Unreal Engine 5 Demo
description: We react to the Unreal Engine 5 Demo running on the PS5 plus we also discuss the Ghost of Tsushima State of Play video and talk I Expect You To Die, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater HD, Assassin's Creed Unity and The Last of Us.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 11: Xbox Series X Gameplay Reveal
description: We walk through all of the third-party games shown off at the Inside Xbox livestream event and debate what constitutes a gameplay trailer plus we also talk A Fisherman's Tale, Streets of Rage 4, Assassin's Creed Unity and Final Fantasy VII Remake.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 10: Assassin's Creed Valhalla Reveal
description: We discuss the reveal and first trailer for Assassin's Creed Valhalla plus we also dig into Xbox Game Pass hitting 10 million subscribers and The Last of Us: Part II's new release date and spoiler leak, plus we talk Moving Out, Gears Tactics, Streets of Rage 4 and more Final Fantasy VII Remake.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 9: Xbox Series X Logo + Best Party Games
description: We discuss the Xbox Series X Logo, speculate on possible next-gen launch titles and recommend some party games plus we also talk Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice, Final Fantasy VII Remake, A Fold Apart and Gato Roboto.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 8: Cooking Mama Drama
description: We attempt to comprehend the Cooking Mama: Cookstar legal dispute and debate the Resident Evil 4 remake rumours plus we discuss the Final Fantasy VII Remake, Blood & Truth, Dragon Age II and Animal Crossing: New Horizons annoyances.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 7: Sony PS5 DualSense Controller
description: We discuss Sony's new DualSense controller, Google Stadia's free trial and some sobering Steam sales statistics plus Final Fantasy VII and The Room VR: A Dark Matter.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 6: The Last of Us Part II Delay + Resident Evil 3
description: We speculate on the reasons for The Last of Us Part II delay and the COVID-19 effects on the game industry plus we talk Resident Evil 3, Oneiros and Riverbond.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 5: Naughty Dog and Crunch Culture
description: We discuss the recent Kotaku article about Naughty Dog's crunch time on The Last of Us Part II plus we also discuss the For Honor documentary Playing Hard, A Short Hike and South Park: The Fractured but Whole.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 4: PS5 Deep Dive
description: We pore over the technical details revealed during the PS5 Deep Dive video and discuss the Game Developers Choice Awards plus we talk Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, Roundguard and The Messenger.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 3: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
description: We discuss the cancellation of E3 and offer a full review of Ori and the Will of the Wisps.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 2: Final Fantasy VII Remake Demo
description: We offer some thoughts on the Final Fantasy VII Remake Demo and discuss the release date announcement for Ghost of Tsushima plus we also talk Ori and the Blind Forest.

title: Game Junk Prototype Episode 1: New Xbox Series X Details
description: We introduce an experimental new format and discuss new Xbox Series X details as well as Gears 5, The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening and Apple Arcade.

title: Episode 40: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order + Best of 2019
description: We force feed Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and count down our top 10 games of 2019 plus we also discuss what we know about the upcoming Playstation and Xbox consoles and the impending video game streaming war.

title: Episode 39: E3 2019
description: We dig deep with E3 2019 to try and come up with 5 announcements we were actually excited about plus we also discuss the Playstation 5 and Playdate news and we talk Cadence of Hyrule, A Plague Tale: Innocence, Observation, Riverbond, Baba is You, Days Gone, Blaster Master Zero, The Messenger and Zuma's Revenge.

title: Bonus Episode: GDC 2019
description: As part of Film Junk's Episode 700 Telethon, we recorded a short bonus episode to discuss some of the big GDC announcements including Google Stadia and Oculus Quest.

title: Episode 38: Best of 2018
description: Graham from Drinkbox joins us as we count down our top 10 games of 2018 and discuss the Epic Games Store launch plus we also talk Red Dead Redemption 2, Onimusha: Warlords Remastered, Starlink: Battle for Atlas, Into the Breach and Return of the Obra Dinn.

title: Episode 37: Guacamelee! 2 + Spider-Man
description: We review Guacamelee! 2 and Marvel's Spider-Man plus we also discuss Detroit: Become Human, Octopath Traveler, Overcooked 2, Hollow Knight, Dead Cells, Dandara, Madden 19, Donut County and in Hot Button we tackle game dev unions.

title: Episode 36: God of War
description: We gather for a group review of God of War plus we also discuss plenty of other things we've played including Nintendo Labo, Mario Tennis Aces, Mass Effect Andromeda, A Way Out, Turok Remastered, Celeste, Way of the Passive Fist, Sea of Thieves, Xenoblade Chronicles 2 and Hungry Shark World.

title: Episode 35: E3 2018
description: We break down the good, the bad and the ugly from every press conference at E3 2018 and count down our top 5 games at the show.

title: Episode 34: Super Mario Odyssey and Cuphead
description: We review Super Mario Odyssey and Cuphead plus we dig into the Star Wars: Battlefront II loot box debate and we talk Uncharted: Lost Legacy, Metroid: Samus Returns, South Park: Fractured But Whole, Call of Duty: WWII, Pyre, Hellblade, The Mummy Demastered, SNES Classic and more.

title: Episode 33: E3 2017
description: We break down all of the major announcements at this year's E3 including the Xbox One X, Shadow of the Colossus remake, two Metroid games, Mario + Rabbids: Kingdom Battle, Beyond Good and Evil 2, Assassin's Creed Origins, Anthem, A Way Out and much more!

title: Episode 32: Nintendo Switch
description: We offer up our first impressions of the Nintendo Switch and several of the launch titles including The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild plus we also talk Horizon Zero Dawn, Resident Evil 7, Nioh, Nier: Automata, Mass Effect: Andromeda, What Remains of Edith Finch, Lego Worlds, Stardew Valley and Yooka-Laylee.

title: Episode 31: Best of 2016
description: We count down our favourite games of 2016 plus we also discuss the latest Nintendo Switch news and Frank announces the game he's been working on over the past year or two.

title: Episode 30: Playstation VR
description: We go under the visor with Playstation VR and discuss the Nintendo Switch announcement plus we also talk No Man's Sky, Gears of War 4, Forza Horizon 3, Madden 17, Terraria, Lunar: Silver Star Harmony, Recore, Battlefield 1, Headlander, Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward and Batman: The Telltale Series.

title: Episode 29: Uncharted 4 and Severed
description: Graham from Drinkbox joins us as we dig into Uncharted 4: A Thief's End and review / discuss the making of Severed, plus we also run down all of the highlights from E3 and talk Inside, Doom, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants in Manhattan, Pony Island, Superhot, The Witness and Trials of the Blood Dragon. (Uncharted 4 spoilers start at 2:14:15 and end at 2:34:15.)

title: Episode 28: Quantum Break and The Witness
description: We review a ton of games we've played over the past few months including Quantum Break, The Witness, Far Cry Primal, Lego Dimensions, The Division, Unravel, Undertale, Firewatch, Kentucky Route Zero and Miitomo plus we also discuss the PS4K rumours and the VR Revolution not to mention our favourite games of 2015 and most anticipated of 2016.

title: Episode 27: Star Wars Battlefront
description: Dax and Jay join us for a group review of Star Wars Battlefront plus we also discuss Rise of the Tomb Raider, Halo 5: Guardians, Fallout 4, Transformers Devastation, Rock Band 4, Guitar Hero Live, Madden NFL 16, Super Mario Maker and Undertale and in Hot Button we tackle the tricky issue of judging value in game reviews.

title: Episode 26: Batman: Arkham Knight
description: A couple of special guests join us to review Batman: Arkham Knight and discuss Apple TV announcements plus we also talk Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain, Mad Max, StarCraft II World Championship Series, Guild Wars 2, N++, King's Quest: A Knight to Remember, Her Story, Madden 16, Dragon Age: Inquisition, This War of Mine and in Hot Button we tackle the tricky topic of pre-orders.

title: Episode 25: E3 2015
description: We give a full rundown of all the announcements at this year's E3 plus we also discuss The Witcher 2 and 3, Splatoon, LEGO Jurassic World, The Unfinished Swan, Battlefield: Hardline, Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris, The Golf Club, Never Alone and The Silent Age plus Frank gets an intervention for his gaming addiction problem.

title: Episode 24: LOST ORBIT
description: We interview the guys from PixelNAUTS (including Frank) about the launch of Lost Orbit and review Ori and the Blind Forest and The Order: 1886 plus we also discuss the Steam mod controversy and Hotline Miami 2, Bloodborne, Dying Light, Counterspy and Axiom Verge.

title: Episode 23: Top 10 Games of 2014
description: We belatedly offer up our favourite games of 2014 and discuss our most anticipated games of 2015 plus we also talk Evolve, Alien Isolation, Costume Quest 2, #IDARB, Kirby and the Rainbow Curse, the Peter Molyneux Godus backlash and the Nintendo YouTube fiasco.

title: Episode 22: Citizens of Earth
description: Ryan from Eden Industries and Huckcity take us inside the development of Citizens of Earth plus we also discuss the latest Nintendo Direct news, Sunset Overdrive, Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker, Beyond: Two Souls, Killzone Shadow Fall, Rollers of the Realm, and in Hot Button we tackle Day One patches.

title: Episode 21: Destiny and GamerGate
description: Chris and Alex from PixelNAUTS join us to discuss a bevy of hot topics including GamerGate and the sale of Mojang plus we also talk Destiny, Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor, Gone Home, P.T., Papers Please, The Swapper, Gang Beasts, and Hyrule Warriors.

title: Episode 20: E3 2014
description: We recap all of the big announcements from E3 and offer our Top 5 highlights plus we also talk Mario Kart 8, Thief, Super Time Force, Child of Light and Wolfenstein: The New Order.

title: Episode 19: Titanfall, Infamous: Second Son and South Park: The Stick of Truth
description: We offer our take on a variety of recent games including Titanfall, Infamous: Second Son, South Park: The Stick of Truth, Towerfall Ascension, Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes and Broken Age plus we also discuss Facebook acquiring Oculus and the Sony reveal of Project Morpheus.

title: Episode 18: Best of 2013
description: We count down our top 10 games of 2013 and discuss our first impressions of the Playstation 4 and Xbox One plus we also look ahead to our most anticipated games of 2014.

title: Episode 17: Too Many Games, Not Enough Time
description: We break down our first impressions of Grand Theft Auto V and the announcement of Steam Machines and the Steam OS plus we also discuss Splinter Cell: Blacklist, Rayman Legends, The Puppeteer, Star Trek, Wonderful 101, NHL 14, Ducktales Remastered and Disney Infinity.

title: Episode 16: The Last of Us and E3 2013
description: On a very special episode of the Game Junk Podcast we are joined by none other than Jay Cheel to review and discuss The Last of Us.  We get into some pretty heavy analysis as to whether gameplay and narrative can co-exist in the world of story-driven games, and take some time to thoroughly explore what is a considered by most to be a landmark in gaming history. E3 has come and gone (mostly gone) but it doesn't stop us in from weighing in on all of the major announcements and revealing some potentially polarizing opinions. As always, we address your Junk Mail and throw in a few barbs along the way.  Buckle in and get ready to stroke that giraffe!

title: Episode 15: Xbox One Reveal
description: We are joined by Graham Smith from Drinkbox Studios to discuss the Xbox One reveal, GDC and PAX plus we also count down our top 5 consoles of all time and talk Bioshock Infinite, Tomb Raider and Guacamelee.

title: Episode 14: Playstation 4 Announcement and the Wii-U
description: We regroup after a six month hiatus to offer thoughts on the Playstation 4 announcement and to discuss the Wii-U plus Resident Evil 6, Halo 4, Ni No Kuni, DMC, Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance, XCOM: Enemy Unknown, The Cave, Xenoblade Chronicles, The Walking Dead and Wayne Gretzky 3D Hockey.

title: Episode 13: Mass Effect 3 and New Super Mario Bros. 2
description: We survive the summer of nothing to discuss Mass Effect 3, New Super Mario Bros. 2, 3DS XL, Lollipop Chainsaw and Sound Shapes plus OUYA, Steam Greenlight and free-to-play games.

title: Episode 12: E3 2012
description: We reconvene to offer thoughts on the 2012 E3 Expo and discuss the 38 Studios shutdown, plus we also talk Diablo 3, Max Payne 3, Fez, Resistance: Burning Skies and more!

title: Episode 11: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning
description: We hack and slash our way through Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning and discuss Kickstarter and next gen console rumours plus Playstation Vita, Mass Effect 2, Binary Domain, Kid Icarus: Uprising and more!

title: Episode 10: Top 10 Games of 2011
description: We countdown our Top 10 Games of 2011 and discuss our most anticipated games of 2012, plus we also discuss the possibility of a TMNT game from Rocksteady and Frank gives an update on his retro game lounge.

title: Episode 9: Batman: Arkham City
description: We review Batman: Arkham City and discuss the Spike TV VGAs plus our Top 5 Comic Book Games, Super Mario 3D Land, Skyrim, Rage, The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword, Rayman Origins, and in Hot Button we take on Game Stopping Bugs.

title: Episode 8: L.A. Noire and Chrono Trigger
description: We take the case of L.A. Noire and revisit a classic in Chrono Trigger, plus we discuss Dead Island, Rage, Resistance 3, Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet. We also get to our top 5 most wanted remakes and debate used games not to mention the overall state of the game industry!

title: Episode 7: Portal 2
description: We throw science at the wall to see what sticks in Portal 2 and weigh in on all of the news from E3 including Wii-U and PS Vita, plus we discuss Killzone 3, Dead Nation, Outland, Crysis 2, Sega Saturn and the Nintendo 3DS.

title: Episode 6: Dead Space 2
description: We brave the terror that is Dead Space 2 and mourn the death of Guitar Hero,  plus we also discuss DC Universe Online, Tales From Space: About a Blob, Stacking, Back to the Future: The Game, and in Hot Button we tackle Non-Gameplay Trailers.

title: Episode 5: Top 10 Games of 2010
description: We count down our favourite games of 2010, plus Dax takes us into his World of Warcraft addiction, and Frank reaches a major milestone in his life.

title: Episode 4: Rock Band 3, Fable 3 and Halo Reach
description:
Reviews galore including Rock Band 3, Halo Reach and Fable 3 plus discussions about Call of Duty: Black Ops, Donkey Kong Country Returns, Kirby\'s Epic Yarn, Gran Turismo 5, and Goldeneye. Also,
 Microsoft Kinect, the future of motion control gaming and our top 5 hockey games of all time.

title: Episode 3: Metroid: Other M
description: Our in-depth review of Metroid: Other M plus discussions about the Playstation phone, favourite horror games, Super Metroid, Red Dead Redemption (again), Costume Quest, Scott Pilgrim vs. The World, Super Scribblenauts, and in Hot Button we tackle licensed games.

title: Episode 2: Alan Wake
description: This month we review Alan Wake and chat about a ton of other games including Madden 11, NHL 11, Castlevania: Harmony of Despair, Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light, Mass Effect 2, and Dead Rising 2: Case Zero plus a Hot Button discussion about achievements.

title: Episode 1: Limbo
description: Sean and Frank kick things off with a review of Limbo, plus discussions about E3, Heavy Rain, Super Mario Galaxy 2 and our Top 5 Games of All Time.
